item.title: EP 194 - The Wand Wielding Loveland Frog
item.itunes:title: EP 194 - The Wand Wielding Loveland Frog
item.description:
Today we meet a boss from hell who wants to send us to an exorcist, we run into a creepy old lady that may have had a hand in the disappearance of a little girl, and then we talk about the giant wand-wielding cryptid known as the Loveland Frog!

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

Lawsuit Alleges Hampton Inn Employee Punished For Refusing An Exorcism

https://lex18.com/news/covering-kentucky/2019/03/28/lawsuit-alleges-hampton-inn-employee-punished-for-refusing-an-exorcism/

 

Eastern Kentucky man sues Hampton Inn, accuses boss of trying to force exorcism on him

https://www.wkyt.com/content/news/Eastern-Kentucky-man-sues-Hampton-Inn-accuses-boss-of-trying-to-force-exorcism-on-him-507789871.html

 

Local man sues Hampton Inn, says manager tried to force him to be spiritually "cleansed"

https://www.wymt.com/content/news/Local-man-sues-Hampton-Inn-says-manager-tried-to-force-him-to-be-spiritually-cleansed-507794781.html

 

Disappearance of LeeAnna Warner

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Disappearance_of_LeeAnna_Warner

 

Missing girl's parents say she behaved oddly before disappearance

https://lacrossetribune.com/news/state-and-regional/mn/missing-girl-s-parents-say-she-behaved-oddly-before-disappearance/article_86a08cd7-2c11-5e56-baac-62872521ca8b.html

 

Loveland Frog

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Loveland_frog

 

Everything You Need To Know About The Loveland Frog, Cincy’s Wildest Urban Legend

http://www.cincyweekend.com/loveland-frog-legend/

 

Loveland Frogmen

https://cryptidz.fandom.com/wiki/Loveland_Frogmen

 

The Loveland Frog

https://skeptoid.com/episodes/4473

 

Yasy Yateré

https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yasy_Yater%C3%A9

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

 

------------------------------------------------

 

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @JasonOCarpenter

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018
